text: Ahmadou Ahidjo Stadium is a stadium in Yaoundé, Cameroon. It is used mostly for football matches and it also has an athletics track. It is the home stadium of Canon Yaoundé, Tonnerre Yaoundé and the Cameroon national football team. The stadium was built in 1972. It can hold around 40,500 people. title: Ahmadou Ahidjo Stadium
